name: Short King
description:
This is my submission for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 (My very first game jam).

HOW IT FITS THE THEME:

You play as a short prince who, after being rejected by the princess for being too short,  is sent on a quest to find a magic crown that allows him to become taller. Along the way, however, his small size allows him to overcome every obstacle he comes across. See what I did there guys. "Less is more." The prince can do MORE because he is LESS tall than everybody else. DON'T WORRY GUYS FIREBALL NERFS COMING SOON

SOFTWARE USED:

Game was created with Unity2D

Sprites were created in Piskel (Using the Endesga 32 color palette)

CREDITS:

The game and all the assets were designed and created during the game jam by me (Anthony), with help from the homies (whose contributions are listed below)

Music and SFX - Westin Prichard (voiced by our friend Adam)

Link to youtube for more music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuVDuvL8vgzqd0p_81OKUdA

Background Sprites and Dirt Tiles - Daniel Weiss

Finally shoutout to SpiderDave from opengameart.org for the inspiration for the stone tiles. https://opengameart.org/content/shiny-noise-bricks
